_summary_

:param Request request: _description_
:param Session db: _description_, defaults to Depends(get_db)
:return _type_: _description_

post.description: Clears the access_token cookie to log the user out.

get.description:
Checks the authentication status of the user based on the access_token cookie
and returns their authentication status, admin status, email, and name.
Retrieves a list of all institutions in the collaboration.

post.description: Creates a new institution with the provided details.

get.description: Retrieves a single institution by its unique ID.

put.description: Updates an existing institution's details by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes an institution by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all members in the collaboration.
Retrieves a list of all board memberships, with optional filtering by board type, member, or institution.

post.summary: Create a new institutional/executive board membership
post.description: Creates a new board membership for a member at an institution.

get.description: Retrieves a single institutional/executive board membership by its unique ID.

put.description: Updates an existing institutional/executive board membership's details by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes an institutional/executive board membership by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all working groups in the collaboration.

post.description: Creates a new working group with the provided name.

get.description: Retrieves a single working group by its unique ID.

put.description: Updates an existing working group's details by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes a working group by its ID.

get.summary: List members of a specific working group
get.description: Retrieves a list of members belonging to a specific working group.

schema.title: Response Working Groups-List Group Members Of Group

post.summary: Add a member to a working group
post.description: Adds an existing member to a specific working group with a given role.

put.description: Updates the role of a member within a specific working group.

delete.summary: Remove a member from a working group
delete.description: Removes a member from a working group by deleting their group membership entry.
